title: User Likes
description: A user can like another user

user_id.description: user_id of the user who liked other user

liked_user.description: user_id of user who is being liked

liked_username.description: username of user who is being liked

liked_first_name.description: first name of user who is being liked

liked_image_url.description: image url of user who is being liked

liked_hobbies.description: hobbies of user who is being liked

liked_interests.description: interests of user who is being liked
